languages.text: "Любопытно. Значит, за моим экипажем приглядывает культ смерти. Люди, что чтут Императора убийствами, чье каждое деяние пронизало служение Ему. Священные палачи".
"Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."
languages.original_text: "Любопытно. Значит, за моим экипажем приглядывает культ смерти. Люди, что чтут Императора убийствами, чье каждое деяние пронизало служение Ему. Священные палачи".

traits.locale_text: "Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew. They who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."
"So there is a death cult lurking in the bowels of my flagship?"
"Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."

"Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."

"Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."

languages.text: « Intéressant. Ainsi, des cultistes de la mort veillent sur mon équipage, eux qui honorent l'Empereur en tuant et dédient chacun de leurs faits et gestes à Son service, comme autant d'exécuteurs consacrés. »
languages.original_text: "Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."

traits.locale_text: « Intéressant. Ainsi, des cultistes de la mort veillent sur mon équipage, eux qui honorent l'Empereur en tuant et dédient chacun de leurs faits et gestes à Son service, comme autant d'exécuteurs consacrés. »

languages.text: «Interesante. De modo que un Culto de la Muerte cuida de mi tripulación, honrando al Emperador a través del asesinato y dedicando cada uno de sus actos a servirle. Verdugos sagrados».
languages.original_text: "Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."

traits.locale_text: «Interesante. De modo que un Culto de la Muerte cuida de mi tripulación, honrando al Emperador a través del asesinato y dedicando cada uno de sus actos a servirle. Verdugos sagrados».

languages.text: “这很有意思。也就是说，我的船上有一支死亡教派在保护我的船员。这支教派的成员都是神圣的行刑者，他们将自己的一切都献给了帝皇，通过杀戮侍奉祂。”
languages.original_text: "Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."

traits.locale_text: “这很有意思。也就是说，我的船上有一支死亡教派在保护我的船员。这支教派的成员都是神圣的行刑者，他们将自己的一切都献给了帝皇，通过杀戮侍奉祂。”

languages.text: 「興味深い。つまり、死のカルトが私の乗組員を見守っているわけだ。彼らは殺すことで皇帝を敬い、皇帝に仕えるためにあらゆる行いを捧げている。聖なる処刑人たちだ」
languages.original_text: "Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."

traits.locale_text: 「興味深い。つまり、死のカルトが私の乗組員を見守っているわけだ。彼らは殺すことで皇帝を敬い、皇帝に仕えるためにあらゆる行いを捧げている。聖なる処刑人たちだ」

languages.text: "Interessant. Es wacht also ein Todeskult über meine Crew ... ein Kult, der den Imperator ehrt, indem er tötet und jede Tat in Seinen Dienst stellt. Heilige Henker."
languages.original_text: "Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."

traits.locale_text: "Interessant. Es wacht also ein Todeskult über meine Crew ... ein Kult, der den Imperator ehrt, indem er tötet und jede Tat in Seinen Dienst stellt. Heilige Henker."

languages.text: "İlginç. Demek mürettebatımı gözetleyen bir ölüm tarikatı var... İmparator'un şerefine adam öldüren, her yaptıklarını O'na hizmet etmeye adayanlardansınız. Kutsal cellatlarsınız."
languages.original_text: "Interesting. So, a death cult watches over my crew — they who honour the Emperor through killing, who devote their every deed to serving Him. Sacred executioners."
